pageContext.claim: “One of them [the “Squad” members of Congress that Trump criticized with racist rhetoric] is polling -- one of them is polling at 8 -- one of them is polling at 8 percent. One of them is polling at 8 percent.”
pageContext.analysis: This is a highly deceptive way to cite the poll about Rep. Ilhan Omar (D-Minn.) and others. It was Axios's decision to publish poll findings given to them anonymously from a Democratic group. The poll surveyed only white voters with less than two years of college education, according to Axios, so it was not representative of all the voters in Omar's district. According to Axios, she was polling at 9 percent among white, non-college-educated voters, not 8 percent.
